page.title: 11Religion in Cronton
page.content: {Religion}Mainly Christian of 69 households questioned 43 worship regularly the remainder do not.Within the households there were 83 C.ofE.,106 R.C. 24 Non-Conformists and 10 other religions.The main religions therefore are C.ofE and R.C. {C.of E.}The services are now held in the school hall, they were previously held in the Mission Hall Cronton village,served from Farnworth parish. The present vicar is Rev.J.Higham. {R.C.}The only purpose built church in the village, called Holy Family, built in 1910. Services were previously held in the school. The present parish priest is Fr.A.McCawley. {Methodist}There is a small Methodist chapel in the village, the minister is called K.Knight.
